=== Filters ===
==== SERVER_FILTER ====
filter server before authentication, give a chance to log-in by your own authentication.
 * Params:
     * MServer $server the server which current user want to log-in
 * Demo:
{{{
RFilter::add("SERVER_FILTER", function (MServer $server) {
    $server->setMongoHost("192.168.1.1");
    $server->setMongoUser("...");
    $server->setMongoPass("...")
});
}}}
